attributes.action: Stop the proposed price increase for Spouse Visas of UK Citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the proposed price increase for spouses of UK citizens. Currently UK citizens are to be paying a huge amount for their right to family life. Unlike EEA citizens for whom it is free.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
